Class TextModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.polsl.java.michal.jakobczyk.lab4.model.TextModel

  • public class TextModel
extends java.lang.Object
    Cotains text that user reads from a file and text that is converted to another language

    4.0
    Author:
    Michał Jakóbczyk
